content.question: The choice of sunflower seeds as the subject matter of the work shown was influenced by their association with

choices.label: agriculture and the triumph of humans over nature
Chairman Mao and China’s Cultural Revolution
the "Sun King", Louis XIV, and the gardens at Versailles

content.answer: Chairman Mao and China’s Cultural Revolution

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
